sentences.english: From which dynasty was the blue---flower porcelain plate in the Hall of Happiness and Longevity left?

sentences.english: There are two huge, delicate blue-and-white porcelain bowls in my home.

The emergence of blue and white porcelain is of epoch-making significance in porcelain history.

sentences.english: A vase with a similar pattern flanked by a pair of ruyi-cloud handles is in the Palace Museum in Beijing.

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Broccoli seed was the optimum material for preparing sulforaphane.
